Installing latest AMD CCC (Catalyst Control Center) on Ubuntu

{{{
cd && mkdir ati && cd ati && wget http://www2.ati.com/drivers/linux/ati-driver-installer-11-1-x86.x86_64.run
}}}

{{{
sudo apt-get install dh-make debconf debhelper cdbs dkms module-assistant build-essential
}}}

{{{
sudo mv -vi /usr/lib/xorg/modules/extensions/libdri.so /tmp/libdri.so
}}}

{{{
sh ati-driver-installer-11-1-x86.x86_64.run --buildpkg
}}}

{{{
sudo dpkg -i *.deb
}}}

{{{
sudo aticonfig --initial -f
}}}

Now restart your computer.

{{{
sudo telinit 6
}}}
